title: FK! DIS GAME TOO MUCH LAG!
body: Been playing for years now. But recently the LAG has become too much to overcome. 1095+ ms spikes have made it where i cannot continue to waste time even trying to wait it out or restart. Maybe it is just me but enough. I will not waste my time fighting and then at the worst possible moments Spike and be in a slow current of toxic chat, irritating pings from strangers.

replies.body: Sudden lag spikes can be caused by network issues like packet loss.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these matches to get an overview of what's going on.  You will find that the results will also offer troubleshooting steps specifically for your issue.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
